Translations.Text: Sapatha ‘tina’ o ‘yayatuna” [1] – era
sapatha ‘ture sinina’ [1]-era
sapatha e'i nirapada nagarira
abasya'i amara srsti karechi manusake sundaratama gathane
tarapara amara take hinatagrastadera hinatame parinata kari –
kintu taderake naya yara imana eneche ebam satkarma kareche; edera jan'ya to ache nirabacchinna puraskara
Kaje'i (he manusa!) Erapara kise tomake karmaphala dina samparke abisbasi kare
allah ki bicarakadera madhye sarbasrestha bicaraka nana
paruna apanara rabera name, yini srsti karechena [1] –
srsti karechena manusake ‘alaka’ hate
Paruna, ara apanara raba mahamahimanbita
yini kalamera sahayye siksa diyechena [1] –
siksa diyechena manusake ya se janata na
Bastabe'i [1], manusa simalanghana'i kare thake
karana se nijake amukhapeksi mane kare
Niscaya apanara rabera kache'i phire ya'oya
Amake jana'o (ebam ascarya ha'o) tara samparke, ye badha deya
eka bandake [1]- yakhana tini salata adaya karena
Amake bala! Yadi tini hidayatera upara thakena
athaba takoyara nirdesa dena; (tarapara'o se kibhabe badha deya)
amake bala! Yadi se (nisedhakari) mithyaropa kare ebam mukha phiriye neya
se ki jane na ye, niscaya allah dekhena
kakhano naya, se yadi birata na haya tabe amara take abasya'i hemcare niye yaba, mathara samanera culera guccha dhare
mithyacari, papistha sam'mukha-culera-guccha
Ata'eba se tara parisadake deke anuka
sighra'i amara deke anaba yabaniyaderake
Kakhano naya! Apani tara anusarana karabena na. Ara apani sajda karuna ebam nikatabarti hona
